short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides Phishing Protection, protection of dangerous websites and Website Tracking.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Phishing Protection and Website Tracking in the cloud with X Surf Log.

The protection of dangerous websites including phishing websites.
This tracking can be seen as a cyber security compliance requirement such as for SOC2 and ISO27001. It can also be useful for legal reasons, compliance reasons, employee risk and cyber security investigations.
